Good Bills
Support Equity & Justice

  • Fairness for High-Skilled Immigrants Act (H.R. 392)

    Eliminates the per-country numerical limits on employment-based immigrants, increasing the numerical limits on family-sponsored immigrants, and for other purposes.

    Introduced
    1/10/17
    Passed House
    2/18/17
    Passed Senate
    Official Law

  • Fairness for High-Skilled Immigrants Act (H.R. 392)

    Eliminates the per-country numerical limits on employment-based immigrants, increasing the numerical limits on family-sponsored immigrants, and for other purposes.

    Introduced
    1/10/17
    Passed House
    2/18/17
    Passed Senate
    3/18/17
    Official Law
